headline: Xylem to Release Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Financial Results on February 10, 2026
summary: WASHINGTON, January 07, 2026--Xylem Inc. (NYSE: XYL), a leading global water solutions company that empowers customers and communities to build a more water-secure world, will release its fourth quarter and full year 2025 results at 6:55 a.m. (ET) on February 10, 2026. At 9:00 a.m. (ET), Xylem’s senior management team will host a conference call with investors.
